patient_info: Papilledema,Hepatic steatosis,Myocardial infarction,Coronary artery atherosclerosis,Splenomegaly,Thrombocytosis,Pulmonary arterial hypertension,Increased circulating IgA level,Difficulty climbing stairs,Osteoporosis of vertebrae,Dilatation of the ventricular cavity,Demyelinating motor neuropathy,Lower limb muscle weakness,Demyelinating sensory neuropathy,Left anterior fascicular block,Abnormal granulocytopoietic cell morphology,Dysesthesia,Abasia,Left ventricular diastolic dysfunction,Left atrial enlargement,Abnormal peripheral nerve morphology by anatomical site,Abnormal thoracic spine morphology
golden_diagnosis: POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome,POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Primary lymphatic malformation (PLM)
2. Neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF1)
3. Familial Mediterranean fever (FMF)
4. Hyperlipidemia-induced hepatosteatosis
5. Idiopathic pulmonary arterial hypertension (IPAH)
6. Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE)
7. Mixed connective tissue disease (MCTD)
8. Inflammatory myopathy (e.g., polymyositis or dermatomyositis)
9. Chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy (CIDP)
10. Metabolic syndrome with complications

Please note that this list is not exhaustive, and the presented diagnoses are based on the provided clinical case. Additional evaluation and testing may be necessary to narrow down the final diagnosis.
